articles.author: AFP
articles.title: US Astronaut Breaks NASA Record For Longest Single Spaceflight - ScienceAlert
articles.description: The astronaut Frank Rubio broke the record for the longest in orbit mission by an American, spending more than 355 days aboard the International Space Station.
articles.content:
The astronaut Frank Rubio broke the record for the longest in orbit mission by an American, spending more than 355 days aboard the International Space Station.
"In some ways, it's been an incredible… [+2187 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Mexican Congress holds hearing on UFOs featuring purported 'alien' bodies - Reuters Canada
articles.description: Mexican lawmakers heard testimony that "we are not alone" in the universe and saw the alleged remains of non-human beings in an extraordinary hearing marking the Latin American country's first congressional event on UFOs.
articles.content: MEXICO CITY, Sept 13 (Reuters) - Mexican lawmakers heard testimony that "we are not alone" in the universe and saw the alleged remains of non-human beings in an extraordinary hearing marking the Lati… [+3310 chars]
